price: Allah, nta yindi mana ibaho ikwiye gusengwa by’ukuri itari We, Nyagasani wa Ar’shi[1] ihambaye.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩
footnotes: [1] Eba uko twasobanuye iri jabo muri Surat ul A’raf:54

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
